C2 to remember something: Can you recollect his name? As far as I can recollect, his name is Edward. [ + (that) ] She suddenly recollected (that) she had left her jacket in the restaurant. [ + question word ] Do you recollect where she went? [ + -ing verb ] He does not recollect seeing her at the party. Synonyms
